anatomical_location: Medial side of big toe, 0.1 cun posterior to corner of nail
healing_function: Stops bleeding, regulates spleen, calms mind
martial_application: Used in revival techniques and pressure resets

anatomical_location: Medial side of big toe, distal and inferior to 1st metatarsophalangeal joint
martial_application: Striking affects balance and energy in leg

anatomical_location: Proximal and inferior to head of 1st metatarsal bone
martial_application: Causes deep foot pain and balance disruption

anatomical_location: In depression distal and inferior to base of 1st metatarsal bone
martial_application: Affects abdomen and digestion with foot pressure

anatomical_location: Anterior and inferior to medial malleolus
healing_function: Strengthens spleen, clears damp, benefits sinews
martial_application: Striking weakens foot structure and ankle

anatomical_location: 3 cun directly above tip of medial malleolus on posterior border of tibia
healing_function: Regulates menstruation, tonifies spleen and kidney
martial_application: Weakens leg, deep pain and nerve disruption

anatomical_location: 6 cun above tip of medial malleolus on line connecting SP6 and SP9
martial_application: Pressure causes temporary paralysis of lower limb

anatomical_location: 3 cun below SP9 on line connecting SP9 and medial malleolus
martial_application: Affects abdomen and hips, can cause shock

anatomical_location: In depression posterior and inferior to medial condyle of tibia
martial_application: Powerful strike disables leg or causes collapse

anatomical_location: 2 cun above superior medial border of patella, bulge of vastus medialis
healing_function: Invigorates and cools blood, removes stasis
martial_application: Target for muscle paralysis and pain

anatomical_location: 6 cun above SP10 on line to SP12
martial_application: Striking disrupts bladder and urinary flow

anatomical_location: Superior to lateral end of inguinal groove, 3.5 cun lateral to CV2
martial_application: Affects reproductive and urinary organs

anatomical_location: 0.7 cun lateral and 4 cun below umbilicus
martial_application: Stunning point for midsection collapse

anatomical_location: 1.3 cun below SP15, 1.5 cun lateral to midline
martial_application: Disrupts gut tension and causes pain

anatomical_location: 4 cun lateral to center of umbilicus
martial_application: Target for gut trauma or bowel collapse

anatomical_location: 3 cun above SP15, 4 cun lateral to midline
martial_application: Point of internal cramping or knockout

anatomical_location: 5th intercostal space, 6 cun lateral to midline
martial_application: Strike disrupts diaphragm and digestion

anatomical_location: 4th intercostal space, 6 cun lateral to midline
martial_application: Painful chest point, disturbs breathing

anatomical_location: 3rd intercostal space, 6 cun lateral to midline
martial_application: Strike disrupts heart rhythm or respiration

anatomical_location: 2nd intercostal space, 6 cun lateral to midline
martial_application: Can stun or stagger when struck

anatomical_location: Mid-axillary line, 6th or 7th intercostal space
healing_function: Controls blood of all luo vessels, unbinds chest
martial_application: Major strike zone, can paralyze or collapse opponent
